text: Ana zirɨv, mbe khɨvɨrga, mbe tɨvi mbatɨgi ga ndɨkndɨgi ndɨkndɨk, ana ram muuŋgi khesharigi. Mbe tɨvir vhuuiaŋ ndɨkndɨgi ndɨkndɨk, ana ram muuŋgi khesharigi. Mbe Fhe Bakɨme kha gumgi gu mbigi ga suaŋv suangeŋ ndɨkndɨgi ndɨkndɨk, ana ram muuŋgi khesharigi. Mbe nta nɨɨŋge kaŋgi fhu, mben ndɨkndɨgi za pham vegi.
